publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

supportDesc.foliation: Ff. 80 to 87 are excluded from foliation. is therefore foliated with '80' et passim.

history.provenance: Before being auctioned in Sotheby's, the manuscript was in the possession of Lord Rennell of Rodd.

msContents.summary: Magic scroll folded in five parts

msItem.note: Treatise indicating the diseases corresponding to the twelve signs of the zodiac with the appropriate medications. The first chapter, dealing with the sign of Capricorn, is missing.
msItem.incipit: ፪ሰውር፡ ወስመ፡ ደዌሁ፡ ከልከሎስ፡ ዛሩ፡ ጢሞስ፡ የሚባል፡ ወሰን፡ ገፈ፡ በልቡ፡ ይነብር፡ የአብድ፡ ወያስተባርር፡ ለዝ፡ ፈውሱ፡ ከርቤ፡ ዕፀ፡ ሳቤቅ፡ ጊዜዋ፡ ወገርት፡ አልቴት፡ ዋግራ፡ ደብርቅ፡ ደቁሰሕ፡ ደይ፡ በአንፉ፡ ወቅባዕ፡ ሥጋሁ፡ በምዳቋ፡ ብራና፡

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning the destruction of the country

msItem.note: Prescriptions against migraine (ለራስ፡ ፍልፀት፡), colic (ለሆድ፡ ቍርፀት፡), čǝfe (ለችፌ፡), for love (ለፍቅር፡), against pain in urination (ለሽንት፡ ምጽ፡), for becoming rich (ለአስተጋብኦ፡ ንዋይ፡), against thieves working through magic (ለሰላቢ፡), against scrofula (ለነቀርሳ፡), fever (ለንዳድ፡), for a success at the market (ለገብያ፡), against syphilis (ለቂጥኝ፡), የሜዳ፡ ውድቀት፡ የዛር፡ ውላጅ፡, albugo (ከዓይኑ፡ በጣለበት፡), a hair growing in the eye (ጠጉር፡ ለበቀለበት፡), corrosive leprosy (ለደዌ፡ ሥጋ፡), and tapeworm (ኮሶ፡), if a horse grows thin (ፈረስ፡ እየከሳ፡), against baldness (ለቧሄ፡), pain in labour (ለምጽ፡), the shadow (ለጥላ፡), fire (ለእሳት፡), snakebite (የአባብ፡ ለነከሰው፡), conjunctivitis (ለዓይን፡ ማዝ፡), hemeralopy (ለዳፍንት፡), jaundice (ዖፍ፡ ለዛረችው፡), ʾabrǝq, scrofula of a horse (የፈረስ፡ ነቀርሳ፡), rheumatism (ለቍርጥማት፡) and the skin disease (መድየት፡).
Almost illegible.
Only 22 out of 30 chapters are present. The last four chapters bear no titles, the places for rubrication remain blank.

msItem.title: Concerning a sale
msItem.note: Chapter on a calculation concerning the chances of a sale, which is 21st in this account, but 24th in .

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning fate
msItem.note: Ḥassāb concerning the fate, i.e. whether a person will like you or hate you.

msItem.incipit: ላህ፯ ወኢላህላህ፡ አብሪም፡ ንዑ፡ ተራውጹ፡ ኵልክሙ፡ አጋንንት፡ በአፈ፡ ሕፃን፡ እገሌ፡
ኖን፡ ቀመሪ፡ ሐሳብን፡ በል፡ ጵነቴ፡ ባንት፡ በኔ፡

msItem.title: Ḥassāb to know whether someone will return or not

msItem.incipit: ሳህላህ፡ ምኙሾጣን፡ ኃረጅም፡ ቤላ፡ ፴ ቤላሆም፡

msItem.note: Indicated with መጽሐፈ፡ መድኀኒት፡ (Book of Medicine).

msItem.title: Ḥassāb on destiny, to know if one will grow rich or become poor

msItem.note: Medical prescription against Magāññā and other evil spirits, for sleeping (ለእንቅልፍ፡), for the asthmatic (በቃታ፡), etc.

msItem.incipit: ሠረገላ፡ ኤልያስ፡ በስመ፡ ሥሉስ፡ ቅዱስ። ዝውእቱ፤ አስማተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ልዑላን። ፩ ያሽመከቢት። ጸሐፍ፡ በዕፍራን፡ ሐፂበከ፡ አከ ለሕሙም፡ የሐዩ፡ እምደዌሁ።

msItem.note: Written in a Magic Square (cf.
Written in a Magic square (cf. ).
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ በል፡ ዝንቱ፡ አስማት፡ መግረሬ፡ ፀር፡ ወጸላዒ፡ ጸናዊ፡ ጰጥናዊ፡

msItem.note: The sixteen circles are depicted on . The text starts on .

msItem.title: Title and introduction
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ መሐሪ፡ ወመስተሣህል፡ ዘተናገረ፡ ፩ ጠቢብ፡ እምነ፡ ብዙኃን፡ ጠቢባን፡ ወፈላስፋ፡ ዘስሙ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ምክር፡ ዘአበው፡ ቀደመት፡

msItem.note: This part is numbered 14th and comes after Ḥawāšin 131, but here it comes before.
This part is numbered 13th and comes before Gǝmbin 131, but here it comes after.

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning a man who is sick
Ḥassāb concerning a man who is ill

msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ መሐሪ፡ ወመስተሣህል፡ ይቤ፡ በዓለ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ዘአስተጋብኦ፡ ፩ ዮናናዊ፡ አርስጣጣሊስ፡
ሐቀ፡ ስቀ፡ ከመ፡ ጫጩት፡ አስተናጭንጮሙ፡ ወከመ፡ ከልብ፡ አስተናክሶሙ፡ ወከመ፡ አድግ፡ አስተራግጾሙ፡ ወያስተአብዶሙ፡ ለመንፈሰ፡ አጋንንት፡

msItem.title: To arouse love
msItem.note: Possibly similar or the same as .

msItem.title: Ḥassāb to know whether one will find riches or not
Ḥassāb to know whether someone will give you riches or not

msItem.incipit: ፩ አሌፍ፡ ሠናይ፡ ለከ፡ ወቦቱ፡ ፍሥሐ፡ ወሐሤት፡ ትረክብ፡ ኵሎ፡ መፍቅደከ፡

msItem.title: Ḥassāb on the stars, ḥassāba kawākǝbt
msItem.note: Composed of twelve chapters corresponding to the twelve signs of the zodiac.

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning the learned man
msItem.note: Composed of sixteen sections.

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning the man who is sick
Ḥassāb concerning a man who is sick
Ḥassāb concerning a man who is ill
Ḥassāb concerning a man's position in life
Ḥassāb concerning grain - to know if there will be sufficient water
Ḥassāb concerning a man who is sick
Ḥassāb concerning a man who is ill
Ḥassāb to know whether people will quarrel or will like each other
Ḥassāb concerning monasteries
msItem.note: According to 148 on mountains.
Cf. 198 and 207

msItem.title: Ḥassāb about the intelligence (?) of a man
Ḥassāb concerning monasteries
msItem.note: According to 148 on mountains.

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning a man who is ill - to know if the person will recover or not
Ḥassāb concerning monasteries
msItem.note: According to 148 on mountains.

msItem.title: Prescription against vaginal haemorrhage of a pregnant woman
msItem.incipit: የደም፡ ልጅ፡ እምቢ፡ ላላት፡ እንበለ፡ ወራቱ፡ ደም፡ ለሚመፃበት፡

msItem.title: Prescription for a man bitten by a mad dog
Prescriptions against the swelling caused by ṭǝfi
Prescription against the swelling of the breasts
Prescription for a man after coitus
Magic prayers and prescriptions
msItem.note: Magic prayers and prescriptions accompanying magic squares and circles (ሰንጠረጅ፡, cf. ).

msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ እጽሕፍ፡ ነገረ፡ ሠርቀ፡ ሌሊት፡ ወልደት፡ ወርኅ፡ በ፩ ሌሊት፡ ወበ፩ ወርኅ፡ ኵሉ፡ ነገር፡ ሠናይ፡

msItem.title: Medical prescriptions
msItem.note: Medical prescriptions against various diseases, some of which are listed below.

msItem.title: Medical prescription against the skin disease wāṭā.
Medical prescription against the ʾǝṣi disease of the ear
Ḥassāb about the dwellings of the kings and princes (?)
Magic prayer against Bāryā, rheumatism, colic, Maggāññā, etc.
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ በል፡ አኽያ፡ ሸራኽያ፡ ከማሁ፡ አጽርእ፡ ወአሰስል፡ ወአርኅቅ፡ ሕማመ፡ ባርያ፡ ወቍርጥማት፡ ቁርፀት፡ መጋኛ፡ ወጉሥምት፡ ዓይነት፡ ወሥራይ፡ በዓለ፡ ግብር፡ ወትግርትያ፡ ፌራ፡ ወንዳድ፡ ጉዳሌ፡ ማሪ፡ ወማሪት፡

msItem.title: Maṣḥafa ʾaʾmǝro wa-labbǝwo - Book of Knowledge and Understanding
msItem.note: Only the beginning was copied and the text ends at . The following eight leaves remained blank and have not been foliated.
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ሠሉስ፡ ዘኅቡረ፡ ሀለዎ፡ ልዑል፡ ዘኢይረክብዎ፡ ንጉሥ፡ ዘይሰምይዎ፡ ጸሐፍነ፡ ዘንተ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ አእምሮ፡ ወለብዎ፡ ጠቢባን፡ ዘአስተጋብዕዎ፡ ማዕምራን፡ እንተ፡ ተርጓምዎ፡ ከመ፡ ይኩን፡ በቍዔት፡ ለእለ፡ ይሤአልዎ፡ ወተስፋ፡ ለእለ፡ የኃሥሥዎ፡ ወአንተኒ፡ ጠንቅቅ፡ አእምሮተ፡ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ወተፋሰስ፡ በዓፃብዒከ፡ ምስለ፡ ካልዕከ፡ ፩ ጊዜ፡ ወኈልቍ፡ ዘወፅአ፡ ዘእንበለ፡ ትጌጊ፡ ወበዝ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ቦቱ፡ ፲ወ፪ አናቅጽ፡

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning monasteries
msItem.note: Divinatory text (ḥassāb) on , which is foliated '80'.

msItem.title: The text of a prayer accompanied by a praxis for the protection of goods
msItem.note: Magic prayer accompanied by a praxis for the protection of goods on , which is foliated '81'.
msItem.incipit: ቢስሚላሂ፡ አራህማኒ፡ እራህም፡ አላሀም፡ ዱዱሊላሂ፡ ገብር፡ ዘንተ፡ ጽሒፎ፡ በክርታስ፡ ወዓቢዓከ፡ በንዋየ፡ ልህኵት፡ ዘቦቱ፡ ምክደን፡ ወጽዒነከ፡ ዓቢየ፡ ዕብነ፡ ወቅብር፡ ኀበ፡ መካነ፡ ጽልመት።

msItem.title: Prayer against miscarriage
msItem.note: Magic pictures (cf. ) and a prescription for making an amulet at the bottom of , foliated as '82'.
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ በል፡ በከመ፡ ረገሞሙ፡ ለአጋንንት፡ ምንሁብ፡ ቍስጥያ፡ ፯ጊዜ፡ አንተ፡ ባርያ፡ ኢትንድፍ፡ ፍሬ፡ ማኅፀና፡ ለአመትከ፡ እገሊት፡ አጽንዕ፡ ሕፃና፡ በማኅፀና፡ ወእውኮተ፡ ወእምውኅዘተ፡ ደማ፡ አርግዕ፡ ደመ፡ ትክቶሃ፡

msItem.title: Magic prayer
msItem.note: Magic prayer on , foliated as '82'.

msItem.title: Ḥassāba lǝdat - concerning birth
msItem.incipit: ለእመ፡ ኮነ፡ ልደት፡ በእሁድ፡ ዝናም፡ ወመዓር፡ ይሐፅፅ፡ ማያተ፡ ባሕር፡ ይየብስ፡ ነፍስ፡ ወኵናት፡ ይከውን፡ ፍሬ፡ ምድር፡
msItem.note: Divinatory calculation (ḥassāb) concerning the birth of a child on , foliated as '84' and '85'.

msItem.title: Magic prayer against Magāññā and several diseases
msItem.note: Magic prayers against Magāññā, colic, pleurisy, for fettering devils, and against madness on , which was foliated '85'.
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ በል፡ ጸሎት፡ በእንተ፡ ሕማመ፡ መጋኛ፡ ወቁርፀት፡ ወጉሥምት፡ አውሎ፡ መላልኩኤል፡ በእንተ፡ ሕማመ፡ አብድ፡

msItem.title: Prescriptions for undoing magic and against fright in children
msItem.note: Prescriptions for undoing magic (መፍትሔ፡ ኪን፡) and against fright in children (ለዘ፡ አደንገፆ፡ ሕፃን፡) on , which was foliated '86'.

msItem.title: Magic prayer for keeping a woman faithful to her husband
msItem.note: Magic prayer for keeping a woman faithful to her husband from , which was foliated '86'.
msItem.incipit: በዝንቱ፡ አስማት፡ ከመ፡ ኢተሀብ፡ ሕልፃሃ፡ ወሕምስሃ፡ ወኢታፍቅር፡ በልቡናሃ፡ ትጽላዕ፡ ወትጽርፎ፡ ለባዕድ፡ እንበለ፡ ብእሴሃ፡

msItem.title: Magic prayers and prescriptions for undoing charms
msItem.note: Magic prayers and prescriptions for undoing charms on , which were foliated '86' to '88'.
msItem.incipit: እፍ፡ እኒ፡ ቀደምሁህ፡ አነኒ፡ ሸፋኒ፡ ተወከልናኒ፡ እምኀበ፡ ሰብእ፡ ይሠዓር፡ ወበስመ፡ መደንግፅ፡ ይዘርዘር፡ ወበስመ፡ ጋዴራ፡ ይትፈታሕ፡ ኅምዘ፡ ሥራይ፡

msItem.title: Prescriptions for eye diseases (Amharic)
msItem.note: Prescriptions for eye diseases in Amharic on , which were foliated '88' and '89'.
msItem.incipit: መድኃኒት፡ ዘዓይን፡ ለጣለበት፡ የደደሆ፡ የመረዝ፡ ያንፋር፡ የበለስ፡ የወንዝ፡ አድምቅ፡ ተቀጽላቻውን፡ አልሞ፡ ደቁሶ፡

msItem.title: Fragment of a magic prayer
msItem.note: Fragment of a magic prayer from , which was foliated '89'.

msItem.title: Magic prayers against demons and a cold
msItem.note: Magic prayers against demons and a cold from , which was foliated '90'.

msItem.title: Magic prayers against headache and to bring about impotence
msItem.note: Magic prayers against headache and to bring about impotence from , which was foliated '90'.

msItem.title: Against headache
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ በል፡ ጸሎት፡ በእንተ፡ ሕማመ፡ ርእስ፡

msItem.title: To bring about impotence
msItem.incipit: ከማሁ፡ ኅትም፡ እስኪቶ፡ ወአልህም፡ ፍትወተ፡ ሥጋ፡ ለእገሌ፡

msItem.title: Medical prescriptions (Amharic)
msItem.note: Medical prescriptions in Amharic on , which were foliated '91' and '92'.

msItem.title: Magic prayer for being loved, for obtaining peace and for acquiring goods
msItem.note: Magic prayer for being loved, for obtaining peace and for acquiring goods on , which was foliated '92'
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ በል፡ ጸሎት፡ በእፍቅር፡ ወሰላም፡ ወበእንተ፡ ንዋይ፡ ሽር፡ ስመ፡ አብ፡ ስር፡ ሽመ፡ ወልድ፡

msItem.title: Prescriptions in Amharic and Gǝʿǝz
msItem.note: Prescriptions in Amharic and Gǝʿǝz against haemorrhoids (ለጀርባ፡ ደዌ፡ ጀርባው፡ ለወጣ፡), disease of the ears (ለሕማመ፡ ዕዝን፡), ʾǝṭi (ለዕጢ፡), and impotence (ለዘሞተ፡ እስኪቱ፡), to find no goods (ወትረክብ፡ ዓቢየ፡ ንዋየ፡), and against colic (የቁርፀት፡).

msItem.title: Magic prayers and prescriptions against fire, thieves, etc.
msItem.note: Magic prayers and prescriptions against fire, thieves, etc. on , which were foliated '93' to '98'.
msItem.incipit: የእሳት፡ መድኃኔ፡ ቆሬ፡ እሳት፡ ሐደ፡ ፍልዱስ፡ ስርከፈር፡ እሳት፡ ተለዓዲር፡ እሳት፡ ነደ፡ ሹር፡ እሳት፡ በኃይለ፡ ዝንቱ፡ አስማቲከ፡ ኢይልክ፡ እሳት፡ ለቤተ፡ ገብር።

msItem.title: Magic prayers against the Evil Eye
msItem.note: Magic prayers against the 'Evil Eye', accompanied by magic pictures (cf. ) and magic glyphs on , which were foliated '99' to '101'.
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ በቅድስት፡ ሥላሴ፡ እንዘ፡ አአምን፡ ወእትመሐፀን፡ እክህደከ፡ ሰይጣን፡ ፃዕ፡ ዓይነት፡ በካመ፡ ወጽአ፡ ዮሴፍ፡ እምሕሱም፡

msItem.title: Prescription against vaginal haemorrhage
msItem.note: Prescription against vaginal haemorrhage from , which is foliated '101'.

msItem.title: Magic prayers against demons, Bāryā, mǝčč, and other diseases
msItem.note: Magic prayers against demons, Bāryā, mǝčč, and other diseases on , which was foliated '101'.

msItem.title: Magic prayers and prescriptions for bringing rain
msItem.note: Magic prayers and prescriptions for bringing rain (ለዝናም፡) on , which was foliated '102'.

msItem.title: Medical prescriptions against diseases of the ear and abdominal distention in Amharic
msItem.note: Medical prescriptions against diseases of the ear (ጆሮው፡ ለሚመግል፡ and ለዘደወየ፡ ዕዝኑ፡) and abdominal distention (ለዘነፍሐ፡ ከርሦ፡) from , which was foliated '102'.

msItem.title: Magic prayer to gain respect and love
msItem.note: Magic prayer to gain respect and love from , which is foliated '103'.

msItem.title: Magic prayers for becoming rich
msItem.note: Magic prayers for becoming rich on , which was foliated '103' and '104'.
msItem.incipit: ወአውርድ፡ ንዋየተ፡ ኵሉ፡ ዓለ፡ ውስተ፡ እዴየ፡

msItem.title: Ḥassāb to know whether news will be good or bad, whether someone will live or die
msItem.note: Divinatory calculation (ḥassāb) to know whether news will be good or bad, whether someone will live or die on , which was foliated '105'.

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning the nature of a man
msItem.note: Divinatory calculation (ḥassāb) concerning the nature of a man from , which was foliated '106'.

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning a journey
msItem.note: Divinatory calculation (ḥassāb) concerning a journey from , which was foliated '106'.

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning war
msItem.note: Divinatory calculation (ḥassāb) concerning warfare from , which was foliated '107'.

msItem.title: Three ḥassābāt concerning husband and wife
msItem.note: Three divinatory calculations (ḥassābāt) concerning husband and wife from , which was foliated '107'.

msItem.title: Ḥassāb for learning whether a woman will bear a child or not
msItem.note: Divinatory calculation (ḥassāb) to determine whether or not a woman will bear a child or not on , which was foliated '108'.

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning wealth
msItem.note: Divinatory calculation (ḥassāb) concerning wealth from , which was foliated '108'.

msItem.title: Ḥassāb concerning monasteries
msItem.note: Divinatory calculation (ḥassāb) concerning mountains from , which was foliated '109'.

msItem.title: Horoscopes according to the signs of the zodiac
msItem.note: Horoscopes according to the signs of the zodiac from , which was foliated '110'.
msItem.incipit: አንቀጽ፡ ለሐመል፡ ቤተ፡ ፀሩ፡ ሑት፡ ቤተ፡ ንዋዩ፡ ሰውር፡ ቤተ፡ ሕማሙ፡

msItem.title: Magic prayer and prescription for receiving revelations
msItem.note: Magic prayer and prescription for receiving revelations on , which was foliated '111'.

msItem.title: Magic prayer and prescription for making a man impotent
msItem.note: Magic prayer and prescription for making a man impotent on , which was foliated '111'.
msItem.incipit: በበስሚላሂ፡ ሁዶክ፡ መሉክ፡ አላ፡ ቅትል፡ እስኪቱ፤ ለእገሌ፡ ከመ፡ ኢያውስባ፡ ለእገሊት፡

msItem.title: Magic prayer and prescription for keeping the fidelity of a woman
msItem.note: Magic prayer and prescription for keeping the fidelity of a woman from , which was foliated '112'.
msItem.incipit: ለዓቃቤ፡ ሕግ። ኮጉርዴን፡ ሱዴን፡ ሰጋሊያን፡ ማቍሪ፡ በዝ፡ አስማት፡ ዕፁ፡ አንቀጸ፡ ሕልፃሃ፡ ወኅትም፡ አንቀጸ፡ መንፈሳ፡ ከመ፡ ኢያውስባ፡ ካልዕ፡ ብእሲ፡ ዘእንበለ፡ እገሌ፡

msItem.title: Magic prayer for being loved
msItem.note: Magic prayer and prescription for keeping the fidelity of a woman on , which was foliated '112'.

msItem.title: Magic prayer and prescription acting as aphrodisiacs
msItem.note: Magic prayer and prescription acting as aphrodisiacs from , which was foliated '112'.

msItem.title: Magic prayer and prescription against Ṣǝlā wagi
msItem.note: Magic prayer and prescription against Ṣǝlā Wagi (ጽላ፡ ወጊ፡) from , which was foliated '102'.

msItem.title: Prayer for being loved
msItem.note: Magic prayer for being loved from , which was foliated '113'.

msItem.title: Prayer against theft
msItem.note: Magic prayer against theft on , which was foliated '113'

msItem.title: Magic prayers and prescriptions for being loved
msItem.note: Magic prayers and prescriptions for being loved from , which was foliated '113'.

msItem.title: Magic prayers and prescriptions against chest pain
msItem.note: Several magic prayers and prescriptions against chest pain (ዘውግዓት፡) from , which was foliated '114'.

msItem.title: Prayers for being loved
msItem.note: Several magic prayers for being loved accompanied by magic pictures (cf. ) on , which was foliated '115'.
msItem.incipit: አናፍግ፡ ጊዜ፡ አናፍድ፡ ፱፡ በዝ፡ አስማቲከ፡ ያፍቅሩኒ፡

msItem.title: Medical prescriptions in Amharic against several diseases
msItem.note: Medical prescriptions in Amharic against ʾaṣǝnt (አጽንት፡ ለሆነበት፡ ሴት፡), pleurisy (ለጉሥምት፡), leprosy (ለለምጽ፡), migraine (ለፍልፀተ፡ ርእስ፡), and hair growing in the eye (ለዓይን፡ ፀጕር፡ እንዳይወፃ፡), for a sterile woman (ለመካን፡) on , which were foliated '115' and '116'.

msItem.title: Several prayers against demons and for protecting goods
msItem.note: Several magic prayers against demons and for protecting goods, especially the horse and the mule of the owner on , which were foliated '116' and '117'.

msItem.title: Magic prayer against sores
msItem.note: Magic prayer against sores on , which was foliated '117'.
msItem.incipit: ይጥፍዕ፡ ወይጸመምሂ፡ ወይርመይ፡ ቍስሉ፡ ለገብርከ፡ እገሌ፡

msItem.title: Magic prayer and prescription for a madman
msItem.incipit: መድኃኒት፡ ለአበደ፡ ሰው፡ ኸየለኸ፡ የሉስከ፡ ያለውስ፡ ኸይ፡

msItem.title: Magic prayer against locusts
msItem.note: Magic prayer against locusts (ለአንበጣ፡) from , which was foliated '118'.

msItem.title: Magic prayers for the protection of goods and the fulfilment of wishes
msItem.note: Several magic prayers for the protection of goods and the fulfilment of wishes from , which is foliated '118'.
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ቡሩክ፡ ወስመ፡ ወልድ፡ ነበልባል፡ ቈራዒን፡ ስመ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ቈላሼር፡ ሾበ፡

msItem.title: Magic prayer for protecting the traveller
msItem.note: Magic prayer for protecting the traveller (ለነጋዲ፡).

msItem.title: Magic prayer against diseases of the heart
msItem.note: Magic prayer against diseases of the heart on , which are foliated '121'.

msItem.title: Medical prescriptions in Amharic Magāññā, periostitis of the leg and nose bleeding
msItem.note: Medical prescriptions in Amharic Magāññā, periostitis of the leg (ለሚሰቀስቃት፡) and nose bleeding (ለነስር፡) from , which is foliated '121'.

msItem.title: Magic prayers for gaining love and respect
msItem.note: Several magic prayers for gaining love and respect on , which were foliated '121' and '122'.
msItem.incipit: ፈጱኖን፡ ሲራክኖን፡ ሀበኒ፡ ፍቅረ፡ ወሞገሰ፡ ለገብርከ፡

msItem.title: Prescription in Amharic against the disease of the scalp
msItem.note: Prescription in Amharic against the disease of the scalp called lašǝt (የላሽት፡) on , which is foliated '122'.

msItem.title: Magic prayers against vaginal haemorrhage and Šotalāy
msItem.note: Several magic prayers against vaginal haemorrhage and Šotalāy and other demons or diseases on , which is foliated '122'.

decoNote.desc: Magic picture containing a Magic prayer (cf. ).
Magic picture containing the symbols of the four Evangelists, the Trinity, two serpents with tails crossed, and the Lamb of God (Agnus Dei) carrying a cross.
Magic pictures accompanied by a prescription for making an amulet.
Magic square of the seven signs.
Magic pictures (ሰንጠረጅ፡) accompanying magic prayers for being loved on , which was foliated '115'.

item.desc: This was a blank page on which a text of Ḥassāba kobar has been copied.
This was a blank page on which has been copied a magic prayer against thieves and magicians.
item.q: በስመ፡ አብ፡ በል፡ ጸሎት፡ በእንተ፡ ሠራቂ፡ ወቀመኛ፡ አመሐልኩክሙ፡ ወአስተኀጸርኩክሙ፡ አንትሙ፡ ሌባ፡ ወቀመኛ፡

item.desc: The name of the owner Gabra Ḥannā is mentioned on and which are foliated '116' and '121'.

msItem.note: Taken from a collection of medical prescriptions (maṣḥafa madḫanit).
The beginning is missing.
Foliated '83'.

msItem.incipit: ለጣለበት፡ ለዓይን፡ ዓይኑ፡ ይመስል፡ ጊሜ፡ ጨምጫማ፡ ዓይኑ፡ የማጨመጭም፡ ለብልዝም፡ ለዘተመልጠ፡ ዓይኑ፡ የብልዝ፡ የጣለበት፡ ዓይን፡

msItem.title: Magic prayer and prescription against diseases of the eye
msItem.note: Magic prayer and prescription beginning on , which is foliated '119'.

msItem.title: Magic prayer and prescription giving protection against black magic
msItem.note: Magic prayer and prescription beginning on , which is foliated '119'.

msItem.title: Magic prayer and prescriptions for protecting the traveller from attack
msItem.note: Magic prayer and prescription beginning on , which is foliated '120'.

Updated p2 and p4 with new LIT IDs for magic prayers
